email_chain.subject: Wheat Shipment - Odessa to Rotterdam - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a vessel available for a wheat shipment from Odessa to Rotterdam. The vessel, MV GOLDEN HARVEST, has a DWT of 75000 and an LOA of 200m. The cargo size is 50000MT, and we are offering a starting freight rate of $45/MT under CIF terms.

The laycan is from 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. Please let me know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
Maritime Traders

email_chain.subject: Re: Wheat Shipment - Odessa to Rotterdam - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Could you consider lowering it to $40/MT? Also, could you confirm the vessel's draft and any restrictions at the discharge port?

Looking forward to your response.

Best,
Sarah Connor
Blue Horizon Chartering

email_chain.subject: Re: Wheat Shipment - Odessa to Rotterdam - Vessel Offer
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your prompt response. After discussing with the owners, we can offer a revised rate of $42/MT. The vessel's draft is 12.5m, and there are no restrictions at Rotterdam for this draft.

Please let me know if this revised rate is acceptable.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Wheat Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

The revised rate of $42/MT is acceptable. Could you confirm the laycan and provide details on the demurrage rate? Also, please ensure that the vessel will be ready for loading as per the agreed schedule.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Final Details for Wheat Shipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I can confirm the laycan remains 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. The vessel will be ready for loading as per the schedule.

If everything is in order, we can proceed with the final documentation.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Confirmation of Wheat Shipment Agreement
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Everything looks good. We accept the terms and are ready to proceed. Please send over the final documentation for review and signature.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best,
Sarah
